item.title: By: Sara
item.dc:creator: Sara
item.description: I love the chocolate sorbet from The Perfect Scoop. The Barefoot Contessa also has a good chocolate sorbet recipe.
item.content:encoded: I love the chocolate sorbet from The Perfect Scoop. The Barefoot Contessa also has a good chocolate sorbet recipe.

item.title: By: Christina
item.dc:creator: Christina
item.description: This sounds great! I like that it's sorbet and not ice cream, as I prefer something lighter to accompany desserts.
item.content:encoded: This sounds great! I like that it’s sorbet and not ice cream, as I prefer something lighter to accompany desserts.
